Name: Marshrutka
About the game: The driver of the minibus got into a time loop and is now forced to forever collect scattered coins and pick up passengers standing by the road, sometimes jumping away from obstacles and maintaining the balance of his car. Marshrutka - A side view game where the player drives a vehicle and dodges obstacles on the roads, collects coins and waiting passengers on the road, the goal of the game is to drive as far as possible and collect passengers in time, otherwise the level of orders will drop. Game Features: -Physics World -Pixel Art -Hard
